headline.sub: Opposing sides blame each other for Syria gas attack
headline.main: Opposing sides blame each other for Syria gas attack

docs.snippet: Graphic amateur video purports to show the aftermath of an alleged poison gas attack on the town of Kfar Zaita, which opposing sides blame on each other. Gavino Garay reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Graphic amateur video purports to show the aftermath of an alleged poison gas attack on the town of Kfar Zaita, which opposing sides blame on each other. Gavino Garay reports.

headline.print_headline: Brodeur Wins What Might Be Final Start for Devils
headline.main: Brodeur Wins What Might Be Final Start for Devils

docs.snippet: Martin Brodeur made 16 saves in what might have been his last start in a 20-year career with the Devils and New Jersey beat Boston 3-2 on Sunday as the Bruins rested many of their stars in preparation for the playoffs later this week....
docs.lead_paragraph: Martin Brodeur made 16 saves in what might have been his last start in a 20-year career with the Devils and New Jersey beat Boston 3-2 on Sunday as the Bruins rested many of their stars in preparation for the playoffs later this week.

headline.print_headline: Rangers Another 1-0 Win to Clinch Astros Series
headline.main: Rangers Another 1-0 Win to Clinch Astros Series

docs.snippet: Martin Perez kept his pitches low in the zone and got plenty of help from the Texas defense....
docs.lead_paragraph: Martin Perez kept his pitches low in the zone and got plenty of help from the Texas defense.

headline.print_headline: Feds to Pursue Effort to End Dispute With Rancher
headline.main: Feds to Pursue Effort to End Dispute With Rancher

docs.snippet: A day after blinking in a showdown on the range, federal land managers pledged to pursue efforts to resolve a conflict with a southern Nevada rancher who has refused to pay grazing fees for 20 years....
docs.lead_paragraph: A day after blinking in a showdown on the range, federal land managers pledged to pursue efforts to resolve a conflict with a southern Nevada rancher who has refused to pay grazing fees for 20 years.

headline.print_headline: PSG Lose Again to Hold Up Ligue 1 Title Charge
headline.main: PSG Lose Again to Hold Up Ligue 1 Title Charge

docs.snippet: Paris St Germain suffered another setback on Sunday when they were beaten 1-0 at Olympique Lyon to slow their pursuit of a second straight Ligue 1 title and inflict further disappointment after their midweek Champions League exit....
docs.lead_paragraph: Paris St Germain suffered another setback on Sunday when they were beaten 1-0 at Olympique Lyon to slow their pursuit of a second straight Ligue 1 title and inflict further disappointment after their midweek Champions League exit.

docs.snippet: The 1989 earthquake that shook San Francisco sent out a wake-up call that continues to echo across the country....
docs.lead_paragraph: The 1989 earthquake that shook San Francisco sent out a wake-up call that continues to echo across the country.

headline.print_headline: Davis' Throwing Error Sends Twins Over Royals
headline.main: Davis' Throwing Error Sends Twins Over Royals

docs.snippet: Pitcher Wade Davis made a wild flip home on a comebacker in the eighth inning and the Minnesota Twins rallied past the Kansas City Royals 4-3 Sunday for a three-game sweep....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pitcher Wade Davis made a wild flip home on a comebacker in the eighth inning and the Minnesota Twins rallied past the Kansas City Royals 4-3 Sunday for a three-game sweep.

headline.print_headline: Marquez Wins in Texas to Extend Perfect Start
headline.main: Marquez Wins in Texas to Extend Perfect Start

docs.snippet: Polesitter Marc Marquez extended his perfect start to the MotoGP season by storming to victory at the Grand Prix of the Americas on Sunday to cap another dominating week in Texas....
docs.lead_paragraph: Polesitter Marc Marquez extended his perfect start to the MotoGP season by storming to victory at the Grand Prix of the Americas on Sunday to cap another dominating week in Texas.

headline.print_headline: Utley Has 3 Hits, HR Gives Phils Win Over Marlins
headline.main: Utley Has 3 Hits, HR Gives Phils Win Over Marlins

docs.snippet: Chase Utley extended his hot start with the tiebreaking homer among three hits, sparking the Philadelphia Phillies to a 4-3 victory over the Miami Marlins on Sunday for a three-game sweep....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chase Utley extended his hot start with the tiebreaking homer among three hits, sparking the Philadelphia Phillies to a 4-3 victory over the Miami Marlins on Sunday for a three-game sweep.

headline.print_headline: Hull City Find Cutting Edge to Tame Plucky Blades
headline.main: Hull City Find Cutting Edge to Tame Plucky Blades

docs.snippet: Premier League Hull City were given a fright as they had to come from behind twice to beat obstinate third tier side Sheffield United 5-3 in the FA Cup semi-final at Wembley on Sunday to reach the final for the first time....
docs.lead_paragraph: Premier League Hull City were given a fright as they had to come from behind twice to beat obstinate third tier side Sheffield United 5-3 in the FA Cup semi-final at Wembley on Sunday to reach the final for the first time.
